SEARCH
Module edu.ntnu.stud
Package edu.ntnu.stud.models

Record Class Matrix2x2

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
edu.ntnu.stud.models.Matrix2x2
public record Matrix2x2(double a00, double a01, double a10, double a11) extends Record
Represents a 2x2 matrix. This class is a record, which is a special kind of class in Java. Good for representing immutable data classes. The Matrix2x2 record has four fields representing the elements of the matrix.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Checks if this matrix is equal to the specified object. The result is true if and only if the argument is not null and is a Matrix2x2 object that has the same elements as this matrix.
      Specified by:
      equals in class Record
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to compare this Matrix2x2 against
      Returns:
      true if the given object represents a Matrix2x2 equivalent to this matrix, false otherwise

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the matrix.
      Specified by:
      toString in class Record
      Returns:
      A string representation of the matrix in the format "[[a00, a01], [a10, a11]]".
